original_title: The Yangtze River Delta serves as a model for Chinese modernization
article_summary: "Yangtze River Delta, a Chinese modernization model, has achieved significant progress in regional integration, contributing 24.8% of China's total economic output. Key industries such as integrated circuits, AI, and new-energy vehicles are thriving, with each city specializing in distinct sectors. Cross-regional policy design, shared science and technology resources, and enhanced public services are fostering innovation, competition, and labor mobility."</s>
